name: Here and there in Lisbon (A photographic journey )
description: Lisbon is a very special city with a wonderful light, history and natural beauty. By taking this trip,you will have the chance to discover the best places,views and angles to get your best shoot. Bring home your fantastic photographic memories. Its quite an experience to walk from downtown,throught crowded large streets,to narrow alleys until you reach the Moorish castle on the top.
